rows.label: tlk70000039_02_msg0001
rows.name:
It's always hard to say goodbye to
another living being. Especially if they
go before their time.

rows.label: tlk70000039_02_msg0002
rows.name:
But it's important to remember the
time they lived. That doesn't go away
just because it had to end.

rows.label: tlk70000039_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I trust in the teachings of Acedia, which
tell us that all souls will be saved

rows.label: tlk70000039_02_msg0004
rows.name:
So death may be hard, but it's not all
about despair. There's salvation to be
found even in the worst of times.

rows.label: tlk70000039_02_msg0005
rows.name:
We just have to pray that we find our
path to salvation sooner rather than
later.
